message.body: Hi! Do you know what your timing is for fridge retrieval? Also do you know when Julianne is coming for the other one Nd could you possibly text me her number?
I'm gonna be at events until 1. The black fridge (yours) is at the end of the hall in front of my room in Lloyd 41. The white fridge (for Julianne) is in the 41 common room. Both are ready to go.
We're on our way with the car
No problem, Elise has your money from Helen :)
